title: Trading t213 Chase for another Chase
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Trading t213 Chase for another Chase
posts.post_content:
I have a nice T213-2 Hal Chase Buffalo holding trophy card I would like to trade for a different Hal Chase. There are still quite a few that I need as well as upgrades so send me a trade offer if interested.
thanks!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=49631&d=1321323862[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=49632&d=1321323870[/IMG]
bump, still looking to trade, got a colgan? caramel? heck Ill take a decent t206, send me an offer :)
one last bump, any trade offers? Also interested in t202's sporting life and m101-4 and 5 of nearly anyone or perhaps a Tris Speaker? :)

Sean

I'm interested in your Coupon Chase....send me a list of the Hal Chase cards you need (or want to upgrade).

[url]tedzan11@comcast.net[/url]

Thanks,

Ted Z
